sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container
    fill-height
    fluid
    grid-list-xl>
    <v-layout
      justify-center
      wrap
    >
      <v-flex
        xs12
        md8
      >
        <material-card
          color="green"
          title="Nuevo Usuario"
          text="Añada los datos para dar de alta nuevo usuario"
        >
          <v-form>
            <v-container py-0>
              <v-layout wrap>
                <v-flex
                  xs12
                  md4
                >
                  <v-text-field
                    class="purple-input"
                    label="Nombre o Compañía"
                  />
                </v-flex>
                <v-flex
                  xs12
                  md4
                >
                  <v-text-field
                    class="purple-input"
                    label="Username"
                  />
                </v-flex>
                <v-flex
                  xs12
                  md4
                >
                  <v-text-field
                    label="Email"
                    class="purple-input"
                    type="email"/>
                </v-flex>
                <v-flex
                  xs12
                  md4
                >
                  <v-text-field
                    label="Contraseña"
                    class="purple-input"
                    type="password"/>
                </v-flex>
                <v-flex
                  xs12
                  md4
                >
                  <v-text-field
                    label="Repetir contraseña"
                    class="purple-input"
                    type="password"/>
                </v-flex>
                <v-flex
                  xs12
                  md4
                >
                  <v-text-field
                    label="Fecha de Nacimiento"
                    class="purple-input"
                    type="date"/>
                </v-flex>
                <v-flex
                  xs12
                  md4>
                  <v-text-field
                    label="Telefono"
                    class="purple-input"/>
                </v-flex>
                <v-flex
                  xs12
                  md4>
                  <v-text-field
                    label="Calle"
                    class="purple-input"/>
                </v-flex>
                <v-flex
                  xs12
                  md2>
                  <v-text-field
                    class="purple-input"
                    label="Número interior"
                    type="number"/>
                </v-flex>
                <v-flex
                  xs12
                  md2>
                  <v-text-field
                    class="purple-input"
                    label="Número exterior"
                    type="number"/>
                </v-flex>
                <v-flex
                  xs12
                  md4>
                  <v-text-field
                    class="purple-input"
                    label="Colonia"/>
                </v-flex>
                <v-flex
                  xs12
                  md4>
                  <v-text-field
                    class="purple-input"
                    label="Localidad"/>
                </v-flex>
                <v-flex
                  xs12
                  md4>
                  <v-text-field
                    class="purple-input"
                    label="Municipio"/>
                </v-flex>
                <v-flex
                  xs12
                  md4>
                  <v-text-field
                    class="purple-input"
                    label="Estado"/>
                </v-flex>
                <v-flex
                  xs12
                  md4>
                  <v-text-field
                    class="purple-input"
                    label="País"/>
                </v-flex>
                <v-flex
                  xs12
                  md4>
                  <v-text-field
                    class="purple-input"
                    label="CP"
                    type="number"/>
                </v-flex>
                <v-flex xs12>
                  <v-textarea
                    class="purple-input"
                    label="Referencias"
                    value="Indique un conjunto de referencias para las entregas de producto."
                  />
                </v-flex>
                <v-flex
                  xs12
                  text-xs-right
                >
                  <v-btn
                    class="mx-0 font-weight-light"
                    color="success"
                  >
                    Añadir Usuario
                  </v-btn>
                </v-flex>
              </v-layout>
            </v-container>
          </v-form>
        </material-card>
      </v-flex>
    </v-layout>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
//import toolbar from '@/components/Toolbar.vue'
//import Modaldetalles from '@/components/Detalles.vue'
import {api} from '@/api'
//import $ from 'jquery'
//import axios from 'axios'
export default {
    components:{
//    toolbar, Modaldetalles
  },
  data () {
    return {
      escrito:'',
      info:null,
      rating: 3,
      id:null,
      show: false,
      rowsPerPageItems: [12, 24, 36],
      pagination: {
        rowsPerPage: 12
      },
      items: [],
      errors: [],
      empty: [],
      content1:null,
      content2:null,
      dialog: false,
      sub:null,
      sub2:null
    }
},
 methods: {
    Submit2(buscado){
      this.escrito = buscado
    }
 },
created() {
    //alert(sessionStorage.getItem("dato"))
    this.info = this.$route.params.info
    //alert("ejemplo "+this.info)
    //sessionStorage.setItem("content1","display:none")
    //sessionStorage.setItem("content2",null)
    //alert(this.content2)
    if(sessionStorage.getItem("dato")!=null){
      this.escrito=sessionStorage.getItem("dato")
    }else{
      this.escrito=''
    }
    api.get(`/ad-usuarios/all-users`)
    .then(response => {
      // JSON responses are automatically parsed.
      this.items = response.data
    })
    .catch(e => {
      this.errors.push(e)
    })


}


}

</script>
